trends: There has been one other sighting in Freeport
There were no other sightings in Freeport on or around March 14th 2010
divs: sighting detailsstanding on back porch smoking after dinner cigar, looked due south saw an object 1.5-2.0 miles away, must've been pretty large, rough triangular shape cruising due eastward at least mach 1 approx.1\4 mile distance suddenly turned north, no gradual arc, perfect l, and disappeared. no aircraft moving at that speed can do that. object had an amber colored light at outward edges, steady-running, and 1 flashing at rear apex between middle?!dark tonite, slightly overcast, lights were how i was able to make out shape of object. this thing just 90*d w\no stoppping or slowing due north and visibly disappeared as if the lights on it were extinguished. dropped cigar on self burnt hand running in here to file report.
Summary: object appeared traversed straight line speeds excess800mph disappeared
